Operation 'ListPartnerSetting' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary is too generic ('Returns a list'). Description lacks clarity on what data is returned and authentication requirements. Added specificity about pagination parameters, return value structure, authentication requirement, and context about partner settings being for account integration. This helps AI agents understand the operation's purpose, inputs, outputs, and when to use it.

data.current_summary: Returns a list of all partner settings.
data.current_description:
**This endpoint allows you to retrieve a paginated list of all partner settings that you can enable.**

You can use the `limit` query parameter to set the page size. If your list contains more items than the page size permits, you can make multiple requests.

Use the `offset` query parameter to control the position in the list from which to start retrieving additional items.'
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated list of available partner settings
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all partner settings available for integration with your SendGrid account. Supports pagination through `limit` (page size) and `offset` (starting position) query parameters. Returns an array of partner setting objects with their current configuration status and integration details. Requires Bearer token authentication.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic ('Returns a list'). Description lacks clarity on what data is returned and authentication requirements. Added specificity about pagination parameters, return value structure, authentication requirement, and context about partner settings being for account integration. This helps AI agents understand the operation's purpose, inputs, outputs, and when to use it.
